version_description:
Take control of your credit future with CreditWise® from Capital One®.

● Everyone’s invited! You don’t have to be a Capital One customer to use CreditWise.
● Credit scores now based on TransUnion® VantageScore® 3.0.
● Weekly updates to your score, accounts, and balances.
● Touch ID sign-in instead of a password (on supported devices).
● Credit Tracker is now CreditWise (oh, yeah - we changed our name).
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

Take control of your credit future with CreditWise® from Capital One®.

● Everyone’s invited! You don’t have to be a Capital One customer to use CreditWise.
● Weekly updates to your score, accounts, and balances.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

Take control of your credit future with CreditWise® from Capital One®.

● Everyone’s invited! You don’t have to be a Capital One customer to use CreditWise.
● Weekly updates to your score, accounts, and balances.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

● Everyone’s invited! You don’t have to be a Capital One customer to use CreditWise.
● Weekly updates to your score, accounts, and balances.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

● We'll email you the second a hard inquiry hits your TransUnion® credit file, helping you detect signs of fraud or identity theft.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

● Review your credit report from TransUnion® to look for signs of error, theft, or fraud. Your credit report includes open/closed accounts, hard inquiries, personal information, and public records that have been reported to TransUnion®.
● We'll email you the second a hard inquiry hits your TransUnion® credit file, helping you detect signs of fraud or identity theft.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

● Review your credit report from TransUnion® to look for signs of error, theft, or fraud. Your credit report includes open/closed accounts, hard inquiries, personal information, and public records that have been reported to TransUnion®.
● We'll email you the second a hard inquiry hits your TransUnion® credit file, helping you detect signs of fraud or identity theft.
● Made your experience better with some bug fixes and enhancements.

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Redesigned navigation to help you explore our features more effectively
· Redesigned credit report summary to give you the information you need at a glance
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Personalized suggestions to help improve your credit score
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Push notifications alert you of important changes to your credit file
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience
· 3D touch quick actions make it easy to access your credit score, credit report, improvement suggestions, and alerts

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· CreditWise is now available to consumers with limited or outdated credit histories
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Sign in with Face ID on your iPhone X
· Easily share CreditWise with your friends and family by visiting the Settings screen and selecting the Invite action
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· CreditWise is now available to consumers with limited or outdated credit histories
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience
Ever wonder why your CreditWise score changes? The Why Did My Score Change BETA highlights changes to your credit and whether they had a positive or negative impact on your score.

Here’s what’s included in our latest update:
· Bug fixes and general enhancements to improve your experience

Here is what’s included in our latest update:
Dark web surveillance, Social Security Number tracking, and Experian® and TransUnion® credit alerts to help you quickly detect fraud for free.
